Categories 1 2 call `` nondistressed behavior , '' categories 3 4 define `` distressed behavior . After initial dose drug sedation level child measure anesthesiologist 2 use University Michigan Sedation Scale ( UMSS ) . Scores 3 accepted procedural sedation 4 accept deep sedation . If UMSS score 3 achieve initial dose propofol thiopental , supplementary bolus drug add .
